overview: It's her first anal, and it's about living in the now and lusting in the now. Handled in five exquisitely beautiful and unbelievably erotic vignettes directed by master cinematographer Hank Hoffman. From Tommy and Kayden slowly stripping off their clothes to reveal their complete vulnerability, to their scorching anal assault, this is sex as you've never seen it, with a superstar you'll want to see again. Kayden is here. Now.
title: Be Here Now
